Name: Sappy Seed
Effect: Single Target. Low Accuracy 1. Ranged. Spend 1 Will Point to activate. At the end of the Round, Roll 2 Dice of Typeless Damage against one Target. Ignore Defenses. The User Heals 1 HP for every Damage dealt this way. If the User of this Move is at its Final Stage of Evolution, this Move fails.
Description: From a magical bean, the user grows a cute stalk that will attach itself to the nearest target. Once it ingrains, it will grow and grow and grow until it reaches the sky.
